headline: Marine Corps Veteran, IT Management, Cyber Security, Resilience, Strategy, Risk & Compliance
about: Innovative technology executive with over 30 years of progressive leadership spanning IT modernization, cybersecurity, and enterprise transformation in regulated industries like healthcare and financial services. Recognized for leading complex multi-site integrations, rationalizing fragmented systems, and driving standardization across large hospital networks. Combines deep expertise in governance, infrastructure optimization, and regulatory compliance to design and execute technology strategies that strengthen performance, reduce costs, and enhance patient care delivery. Brings a proven record of transforming decentralized IT operations into cohesive, high-performing environments through disciplined assessment, vendor rationalization, and stakeholder alignment.

experiences.title: Director IT Management and Cyber Security
experiences.jobDescription:
•	20% Cost Reduction of IT Operations: Streamlined internal and client IT operations to achieve a noticeable cost reduction by eliminating redundant tools and processes.
•	75% Vulnerability Reduction: Guided clients to measurable decrease in enterprise risk exposure through implementation of SIEM analytics, endpoint detection automation, and Zero Trust security architecture.
•	100% Regulatory Alignment: Achieved sustained HIPAA, HITRUST, and SOC 2 compliance across all clients using automated GRC workflows, audit-readiness testing, and continuous monitoring dashboards and policy development.
•	Enterprise Automation and Orchestration: Champion automation, orchestration, and containerization (e.g., Terraform, Ansible, Kubernetes) to improve deployment speed, reduce manual effort, and enhance system reliability.
•	Enterprise Application Rationalization: Consolidated and standardized multi-location systems, eliminating redundant platforms and reducing software licensing costs through data-driven technology audits.
•	Cloud Infrastructure Modernization: Executed hybrid cloud transformation for clients by integrating AWS and Azure environments to enhance scalability, encryption, and disaster recovery capabilities.
•	Vendor Relationship Management: Manage vendor relationships, contracts, and negotiations related to infrastructure hardware, software, cloud, and managed services.

experiences.title: Director IT and Cyber Engineering
experiences.jobDescription:
•	40% Improvement on Infrastructure Operations: Design and execute infrastructure and operations strategies supporting enterprise business objectives, ensuring scalability, security, and high availability across hybrid (on-prem and cloud) environments.
•	Infrastructure Leadership and Management: Provide leadership and direction for all infrastructure domains including open systems (Windows/Linux), networking, CloudOps, storage, database, and IBM systems.
•	Daily Operations: Oversee daily operational activities including system monitoring, patching, maintenance, backup, and recovery, ensuring stability and adherence to SLAs.
•	Operational Resiliency: Lead disaster recovery and business continuity planning, testing, and documentation for all critical systems and applications.
•	80% Compliance Improvement: Increased enterprise GRC maturity by integrating automation tools aligned with HITRUST and HIPAA frameworks, accelerating audit readiness and risk remediation.
•	70% Incident Reduction: Reduced security incidents through vulnerability scanning automation, real-time threat detection, and endpoint protection standardization.
•	NIST-Based Breach Response: Directed root-cause investigations and incident containment under NIST 800-61 protocols, ensuring zero loss of ePHI and rapid operational recovery.
•	Cross-Functional Governance Alignment: Collaborated with compliance, privacy, and clinical operations to unify IT security strategy with business continuity and care delivery goals.
•	Risk Visibility Expansion: Implemented data-driven risk-scoring models, providing executives real-time insights into security posture and resource prioritization.
•	Optimization of Hybrid Virtualized Environment: Optimize highly available VMware and Azure hybrid environment ensuring adherence to security policies and regulatory requirements.

experiences.title: Information Security Officer & Director of Information Technology Operations
experiences.jobDescription:
•	Operational Management: Establish and monitor operational KPIs and Service Level Objectives (SLOs) to measure performance, drive accountability, and identify opportunities for improvement.
•	Infrastructure Reliability and Capacity: Oversee capacity planning and performance tuning to ensure optimal utilization of compute, storage, and network resources.
•	Infrastructure Architecture, Redundancy and Resiliency: Direct evaluation and selection of network, server, storage, and co-location technologies to meet enterprise needs and future scalability.
•	90% Cyber Maturity Increase: Elevated compliance standing through integration of HITRUST, HIPAA, and SOC 2 frameworks, driving measurable improvements in audit performance.
•	75% Threat Reduction: Hardened enterprise infrastructure through endpoint encryption, role-based access control, and network segmentation, achieving measurable reduction in vulnerabilities.
•	Migration of VMware Environment to on-prem: In migration of VMware enterprise from MSP to on-prem optimized for local based HP SAN storage.
•	Optimization of Hybrid Virtualized Environment: Optimize highly available VMware and Azure hybrid environment saving over 40% on Azure resources.
•	Management of Highly Available VMware environment:  Established the VMware virtualized environment into a highly available environment that sustained zero (0%) unscheduled downtime over 26 months.

experiences.title: Senior Technology Manager, Security and Compliance
experiences.jobDescription:
•	30% Audit Performance Improvement: Strengthened client audit scores under HIPAA, PCI-DSS, and SOC 2 through policy enforcement, automated evidence collection, and compliance analytics.
•	Cloud Security Integration: Spearheaded secure Azure and AWS migrations, enhancing data protection by 30% through advanced encryption and IAM strategies.
•	Architect and Delivery of 28 new datacenters: Working with clients and project engineers to design and deliver new production datacenters utilizing state of the art VMware and Hyper-V virtualization systems.  Integrating operational virtualization and storage centered around NetApp OnTap, Dell/EMC OpenManage/SRM/PowerFlex, and HPE OpenView SAN solutions.
•	Upgrade and Improvement to 147 Datacenters:  Working with clients to upgrade and improve existing datacenter infrastructures, improving networking, hardware, storage and operability creating highly available datacenters with improved capability and cutting edge technology.

experiences.title: Principal Solutions Engineer
experiences.jobDescription:
•	Enterprise Performance Gains: Delivered infrastructure upgrades improving data throughput and storage efficiency for large enterprise clients across healthcare and finance sectors.
•	Proof-of-Concept Acceleration: Led ROI-driven testing and validation cycles that demonstrated measurable performance improvements for client systems.
•	Virtualization Optimization: Deployed high-speed flash storage and hypervisor integration, enhancing system reliability and data access speed.

experiences.title: Director, Solutions Engineers
experiences.jobDescription:
•	Infrastructure Latency Reduction: Engineered cutting-edge data storage solutions, enhancing processing efficiency by 30% and reducing user response times by 25% in critical applications.
•	Engineering Team Expansion: Built and managed a national engineering unit delivering secure, compliant enterprise solutions for healthcare and financial clients.
•	Client Success Delivery: Spearheaded design of end-to-end infrastructure projects, achieving 95% SLA adherence and meeting compliance standards.

experiences.title: Enterprise Architect / Senior Infrastructure Consultant
experiences.jobDescription:
•	Proven expertise: Develop, document, and deliver presenting architecture and implementation roadmaps integrating multiple technologies in enterprise environments
•	Demonstrate solid design principles:  Presented methodologies, and creative thinking to produce business-aligned technology architectures
•	Design and Deliver: Implementation of guidelines for secure virtualized enterprise environments. Engaged clients to deliver highly secure and available enterprise environments.
•	Define and Deliver Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity plans: Addressed short- and long-term critical business requirements.

experiences.title: Director of Information Technology Operations and Security
experiences.jobDescription:
•	Designed and Delivered First SaaS offering:  Migrated VMware environment from on-prem to highly available CoLo facility to facilitate development of companies first SaaS offering.
•	System Performance Optimization: Improved infrastructure uptime through continuous monitoring, virtualization, and automation, minimizing system outages.
•	Information Security Enhancement: Implemented NIST CSF-aligned security controls, enhancing security maturity by 30% and reducing audit deficiencies by 50%.
•	Operational Process Efficiency: Streamlined IT support functions, accelerating incident resolution and improving service delivery metrics.

recommendations.context: Rod was Lisa's client
recommendations.description:
Lisa was our realtor in early 2015 but she was much more than just your typical realtor. Lisa went to great extent to explain the process.  She not only told us our options but ensured we understood why certain options were better and why we shouldn't make certain considerations.  Lisa actually joined our endeavor more as a consultant and friend than as a realtor.  Lisa ensured that our purchase was completed properly and that we were at no time taken advantage of.  She brought a team of professionals with her from the inspector, appraiser, and even a reputable lender to ensure our process was handled professionally and we were fully informed along the way and any question was answered quickly.  Lisa works on your side and takes your best interests to heart.  She knows that purchasing a house is a major endeavor and her job is to guide you through that process.  

I am not a real estate professional that's why I worked with Lisa and I will never use another realtor.  I like having this little pit-bull on my side.

headline: Food & Beverage Consultant | Cost Control Strategist | HACCP-ISO 22000 Certified|Data Driven & AI assisted Performance  Optimization
about:
With strong experience in Food & Beverage operations, I help restaurants, hotels, and hospitality businesses improve efficiency, quality, and profitability. I bring international exposure, having worked across multiple countries, and I am fluent in French, English, and Mandarin, which allows me to communicate effectively with diverse teams and clients.

My expertise covers daily operations, team management, cost control, HACCP compliance, and remote administrative support.

🔹 Core Skills
• F&B Operations Management
• Food Costing & Budget Control
• Stock & Inventory Management
• HACCP & Quality Assurance
• Menu Engineering
• Supplier Coordination & Purchasing
• Team Leadership & Training
• SOP Implementation
• Remote F&B Support & Reporting
• Multilingual: FR | EN | 中文

🔹 Remote F&B Support (Canada & International)
I provide remote operational and administrative services for restaurants in Canada and surrounding regions, including:
• Menu costing & inventory management
• Food cost analysis
• HACCP documentation
• Staff scheduling & operational reporting
• SOP setup and compliance
Helping businesses optimize performance without the need for on-site presence.

🔹 Specialist in Dubai Real Estate for F&B Businesses
In addition to my F&B expertise, I also specialize in commercial real estate in Dubai.
I support restaurant owners, café operators, cloud kitchens, and hotel investors in finding:
• Commercial shops
• Restaurant-ready units
• F&B plots
• Hotel-related commercial spaces
Ensuring the right location, zoning, DED activity, and RERA/DLD compliance for a successful business launch.

🔹 What I Deliver
Clear processes, efficient cost management, strong hygiene standards, and improved guest experience — all contributing to solid operational performance.

🔹 Let’s Connect
Open to collaborations, new opportunities, and professional support in F&B operations, remote services, or Dubai commercial real estate.

experiences.title: Food and Beverage Manager
experiences.jobDescription:
Lead end-to-end Food & Beverage operations across bar, kitchen, and guest service for large-scale events and VIP functions
• Manage and control operating budgets, including food cost, labor cost, and supplier contracts
• Achieved up to 15% reduction in food and operational costs through vendor negotiation, waste reduction, and inventory optimization
• Recruit, train, schedule, and supervise 12+ staff, improving service consistency and team performance
• Implement and monitor HACCP and food safety protocols, ensuring 100% compliance during inspections and audits
• Coordinate with event organizers to deliver customized menus and VIP setups, increasing client satisfaction and repeat bookings
• Track and analyze KPIs such as sales revenue, guest count, food cost percentage, and labor efficiency to support management decisions
• Maintain strong supplier relationships to ensure cost-effective procurement and stock availability

experiences.title: Event Coordinator
experiences.jobDescription:
• Successfully delivered 100+ events from planning to execution, including corporate, private, and public functions
• Managed event logistics including staffing, F&B service, setup, and breakdown
• Coordinated teams of up to 20 staff per event, ensuring smooth operations and service quality
• Maintained full compliance with local regulations, safety standards, and hygiene requirements
• Consistently achieved high client satisfaction, leading to referrals and repeat engagements
• Managed event budgets and controlled costs to meet client expectations without compromising quality

experiences.title: Food Production Manager
experiences.jobDescription:
• Oversaw daily operations of a bakery production unit serving both retail and B2B clients
• Managed and trained a production team of 15 employees, including scheduling and performance evaluations
• Reduced production and operating costs by 15% through process improvements and supplier negotiations
• Implemented and maintained ISO 9001 and HACCP standards, ensuring consistent product quality and food safety compliance
• Improved workflow efficiency and production planning, resulting in better output consistency and reduced waste
• Monitored inventory levels and raw material usage to optimize purchasing and minimize losses

As Assistant Manager, he was present, attentive, and fully committed ... whether it was supporting the staff, handling last-minute challenges, or ensuring every customer left satisfied. ☺️
What stood out most to me was his hands-on approach and genuine respect for people. He leads by example and truly cares about doing things right.

I have no doubt that Tiary will bring value wherever he goes.
A great leader, a solid teammate, and above all ,a good person.
👏🤝🌟

headline: I Lift People and Teams 🔥  I 8 Time Best Selling Leadership Author I 🔥 Keynote * TEDx * I’M Possible Podcast I  Children’s Charity ‘Time4sharing Mission I’M Possible Corp I Time4sharing.org I Book & Speaker Coach
about: As President and Co-Founder of Time4sharing Mission I'M Possible Corp for the past 25 years, we have lifted hearts and smiles for over 17,000 Children with our Mission I'M Possible Events across Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia.We serve children who need us, whether they are orphaned or differently abled mentally or physically, or going through a battle with cancer or otherwise, our I'M Possible Now empowerment events are all from the heart of our volunteer teams.See more about our mission and sponsors on www.time4sharing.org In the commercial world, I act as CEO of Carrington.Agency which is helping our clients transform their life experience into pages and stages. We enable executives, start-up founders, and retired persons to distill their experiences and voice their own authority into their own book and then prepare them to stand in the spotlight as a paid speaker. Our team of writing assistants, editors, publicity, and branding experts expertly transforms our clients into go-to experts on the conference circuit. Our 'Mission: I'M Possible Now' High Performance Events Impact leaders and sales teams. The firm's success is built on decades of experience providing a foundation of impactful leadership development, augmented by C-level coaching and international consulting. All of the proceeds from these events go to support our charity activities. Our team excels in elevating sales leadership and innovation through tailored development programs and strategic executive placement, highlighted by our strategic alliance with Transgisticstalent.comSimultaneously, my capacity as a CSR Leadership speaker and workshop facilitator enhances our service portfolio, allowing us to offer a holistic approach to talent development with a focus on performance enhancement and Executive Search.We empower organizations by aligning their leadership strategy with market demands, leveraging my expertise in niche marketing and new business development. Our commitment to 'edutainment' ensures an engaging learning experience that drives performance and delivers tangible results for our clients.https://www.terrificspeakers.com/mj-tolanCoach M J Tolan's Books on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/stores/Coach-M-J-Tolan/author/B01GLTY60S?ref=ap_rdr&isDramIntegrated=true&shoppingPortalEnabled=trueur

updates.postText: By Coach MJ Tolan You’ve spent a career making high-stakes decisions, leading teams, navigating crises, mentoring others, and bringing visions to life. What if all of that was more than just a professional legacy? What if it was the foundation for your next chapter—as a published author, keynote speaker, and respected thought leader? Many executives underestimate the transformative potential of their own lived experiences. The late nights, the make-or-break moments, the cultural shifts you led—these aren’t just career milestones. They’re stories with the power to teach, inspire, and move others. What you’ve learned the hard way, others are desperate to understand. Your journey holds insights that no textbook or MBA program can replicate. And when those insights are shaped into a compelling message, they become legacy assets—a book, a platform, and a voice that can ripple across industries, stages, and generations. But here’s the truth: writing a book and stepping into thought leadership isn’t just about typing up war stories or reliving boardroom battles. It requires clarity, structure, narrative, and positioning. This is where a seasoned coach becomes not just helpful—but essential. A coach helps you zoom out and spot the transformational arc in your story. They ask the deeper questions: What’s the defining message that ties your career together? Who needs to hear this now? What’s the problem you solve? What’s the shift in thinking only you can provoke? Through powerful frameworks and deep listening, a coach extracts the gold from your journey and helps refine it into a signature message—one that can anchor a book, a keynote, and even a movement. Then there’s the execution: shaping your manuscript, building your storytelling voice, organizing your IP, and preparing you for your public debut—not just on the page, but on stage. A coach is your strategic partner in defining your author brand, designing your book’s structure, overcoming writing resistance, and aligning your story with your future goals. They help you write with both authenticity and audience clarity—so your book doesn’t just land, it resonates. And the benefits? They go far beyond publishing. A book becomes your calling card, your differentiator, your door-opener. It cements your credibility in a noisy marketplace and positions you as the authority you already are. As a speaker, it gives you substance, context, and proof. It helps potential clients, investors, boards, and media understand your value—because your story is no longer confined to a résumé. It lives in a narrative that moves people to act. If you’ve ever felt that your journey was meant for more than just a closing chapter in your career, now is the time to act. The world doesn’t need more noise. It needs wisdom. And no one else has walked your exact path. Let a coach help you illuminate it. Let your story become your greatest legacy. And let that legacy become your launchpad. FROM EXECUTIVE TO AUTHOR TO KEYNOTE STAGE A Message from Coach M J Tolan | The Mission: I'M Possible What if the life you've already lived is the message the world is waiting to hear? 🎤 Phil Knight (Nike) wrote Shoe Dog and became a storytelling icon. 🎤 Mel Robbins shared her personal breakthrough and launched a global movement with The 5 Second Rule. 🎤 Marc Randolph (Netflix co-founder) turned his rollercoaster startup tale into a best-selling book — and now commands packed keynote stages worldwide. 🎤 Steve Pemberton rose from adversity to the C-suite and shared it all in A Chance in the World, becoming a beacon for inclusive leadership. Each of them transformed their life experiences into a book — and their book into a brand. And they all started with one bold step: 🟠 They told their story. 🟠 They packaged their insight. 🟠 They owned the mic. So, here’s the question... What story are YOU sitting on? The one that taught you resilience. The one that shaped your leadership. The one that could change someone else’s path. Maybe you're: ✅ A retired exec with decades of wisdom. ✅ A founder who’s been through fire and came out forged. ✅ A mission-driven professional who wants to spark impact. You don’t need a publishing deal. You need a partner. 💥 Introducing: Booked2Speak.com Powered by Carrington Agency, Booked2Speak is the launchpad for thought leaders ready to: ✔ Write a bestselling book rooted in lived experience ✔ Turn that book into a magnetic signature keynote ✔ Get booked on stages, summits, podcasts, and virtual events ✔ Become a transformational speaker — with a clear message, brand, and revenue model We don’t just help you write a book. We help you become the voice your industry didn’t know it needed. Whether you're still crafting your story or you’ve been journaling for years, it’s time. 🔥 The Mission: I’M Possible As a cancer warrior, keynote speaker, and storytelling coach, I’ve learned one thing for sure: “The most powerful stages are reserved for those who dare to share what they’ve survived, solved, or surrendered.” This isn’t about fame. It’s about legacy. It’s about activating your voice to serve others. 👣 Ready to take the first step? ➡️ Visit www.Booked2Speak.com ➡️ Join the ranks of executives, founders, and change-makers who turned their lives into literature… and their message into movement. Let’s make your voice undeniable. 📩 DM me “STORY READY” or drop a 🟠 in the comments, and we’ll connect you directly with the team. Remember… "Your story isn’t over — it’s about to take the stage." – Coach MJ Tolan, The Mission: I’M Possible 🎙️ Share Your Story With the World You have a story that can inspire others. When you join us as a guest on our podcast, we’ll help you talk about the most powerful lessons and moments from your life. These golden nuggets of your experience could even be the start of your own book. This is your first step. Let’s begin the journey together. 👉 Apply now to be a guest on our podcast. https://forms.gle/59FmP3MKzyhAi4HJ7 Ready to Make Your Voice Count? recommendationsReceived.name: Dave Crane
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Ex-BBC | Global Speaker & MC (WEF, LEAP, UN) | Industry Icon Mentor | I Help CEOs & Leaders Build Trust, Authority and Credibility to Lead Their Industry Across Global Stages Now
recommendationsReceived.context: Dave worked with Coach MJ but they were at different companies
recommendationsReceived.description:
MJ Tolan is a dynamo in the world of executive search and sales leadership, with a track record that’s as impressive as it is inspiring. At the core of Firepower Talent Partners, he specializes in scouting and nurturing rock star sales leaders, those rare finds who can significantly nudge the growth needle for businesses across various sectors.

I also think of him like a big brother.

MJ isn’t just about finding talent; he’s about shaping it. His journey saw him skyrocket sales figures to over 100 million USD across 8 markets as a CEO, a testament to his mastery in sales and leadership. His role as an international keynote speaker and an award-winning author of "Executive Powers, Cracking the code to Magnetic Leadership" reveals his passion for sharing his wealth of knowledge.

His entrepreneurial spirit is evident in his history of scaling companies, including a remarkable growth story from a 3-person team to a 790-strong workforce. His expertise isn’t confined to one region; MJ has a global footprint, with significant achievements in markets like Eastern Europe, Dubai, Lebanon, and Asia.

MJ's approach to leadership and sales is rooted in real-world experiences, managing diverse, multi-lingual, and cultural teams. These experiences aren't just business lessons; they're life lessons that he generously shares in his book and as a faculty member at world-class institutes.

With a personal coaching tally that impacts thousands of business owners and a lively presence on his podcast "The Real Mission: I'M Possible Show", MJ’s influence stretches far beyond boardrooms and sales floors.

For those seeking a speaker who can not only entertain but enlighten, MJ is a go-to TEDx speaker. He’s not just offering advice; he’s offering a transformation journey. If you're ready to take your sales leadership to the next level, or if your event needs a speaker who can truly captivate, MJ Tolan is just an email away.

recommendationsReceived.context: Joe worked with Coach MJ but they were at different companies
recommendationsReceived.description: Coach M J Tolan is a phenomenal leader you need to know. He elevates, empowers and inspires leaders at all levels to exceed expectations by sharing timeless principles of excellence and proven wisdom. Michael knows that great leadership is both learned and inherited, teachable and intrinsic, science and art. I am privileged to know him as a selfless leader, caring mentor, and co-author of the #1 Amazon Bestseller, “Unleashing Firepower: Masters of Business Excellence.” Michael has started a movement that is changing people’s lives for the better. Reading, understanding, and mastering the principles he conveys in this unprecedented work will enhance your influence, and your leadership. Those you lead will benefit greatly. I know I do. Further, his boundless generosity in caring for so many in need — especially children — through charitable acts, global networks, and giving of himself despite every challenge or obstacle, express his unbounded ethos of quiet professionalism and utmost humility. Michael, keep leading with conviction, serving with honor, and inspiring us all to aim higher and achieve more in service to others!

Having had the immense pleasure of witnessing Dave's magic on the speakers' stage multiple times over the years, I am compelled to express my admiration for his unparalleled abilities.

Dave possesses a unique mastery of the stage, commanding it with an ease and confidence that can only be described as extraordinary. His ability to engage with the audience is unmatched, transforming even the most mundane events into memorable experiences that resonate with every attendee. Dave's approach is not just about presenting; it's about creating a shared moment of joy, learning, and enthusiasm that lifts everyone out of their seats.

What sets Dave apart is his innate talent for making each event not just fun but truly impactful. He has a knack for understanding the pulse of the audience, delivering content that is both relevant and exhilarating. Whether it's a corporate conference, an educational seminar, or any gathering in between, Dave ensures that the essence of the event is elevated to a level that far exceeds expectations.

In a world where genuine engagement and entertainment are precious commodities, Dave Crane stands out as the best event host I have ever encountered. His dedication to excellence, combined with his natural charisma and professional expertise, makes him an invaluable asset to any event. If you're seeking a host who will transform your event into an unforgettable experience, look no further than Dave Crane. He is, without a doubt, the best Event Host in the business.

recommendations.name: Dave Crane
recommendations.subtitle: Ex-BBC | Global Speaker & MC (WEF, LEAP, UN) | Industry Icon Mentor | I Help CEOs & Leaders Build Trust, Authority and Credibility to Lead Their Industry Across Global Stages Now
recommendations.context: Coach MJ worked with Dave but on different teams
recommendations.description:
I could not tell you enough about this amazing man, Dave Crane.
We met in Dubai over 20 years ago and I have admired his forward thinking energy, his comfort with a Microphone in his hand, his diversity on stage as both a keynote, an emcee, a moderator.
I have had the pleasure of sharing the stage as speakers in a couple of events and I was so excited to see how the audience would respond to him in milliseconds.  He is a phenomenal speaker.

Dave also has created after the Life Designers  so many other amazing projects, including to his Hypno -Show which left me and the entire audience Mesmerized. 
He genuinely is the real deal.
After returning to the US I followed his activities on line and the Epic programs he did with the Toilet Paper Diaries,  during Covid,  totally Ground breaking. 
However , my endorsement would be nothing if I did not give him Kudos for his Game Changers and Industry Icon Programs which I was encouraged to become part of after my bout with Cancer.

Dave's programs allowed me to reflect on where I was in my own career during my recovery. His wealth of knowledge , quick witted humor, sincere empathy and positive attitude instatnly helped lift me up out of the depths of hopelessness that anyone who has been handed a  devastating diagnosis would face.
He helped me as coach, mentor and friend to get the compass out and redraw a new directional map for the future.
Recently when I was selecting experts for the collaborative book, Unleashing Firepower, Masters of Business Excellence,  I immediately knew Dave would be the right person to help guide our readers and inspire them to get on stage and become an Industry Icon themselves.
Everyone has a story in them, Dave shows them the way to do it.

recommendations.name: Joe Polanin

recommendations.description:
There are moments in your life and career when you cross paths with someone who has  made a profound impression upon you. 

This is what happened to me after meeting Joseph Polanin , Captain USN ( Ret)

He lifts people up at every opportunity, his authentic character shines through all of the noise of the world like a bright shining and soothing light.

It was this specialness, his humility, care, thoughtfulness that I found so disarming coming from someone who has shouldered more responsibility than most, on and off the battlefield. That is what make him so Awesome.

I was compelled to enlist his experience and wisdom to become one the Co-Authors of  our new book , Unleashing Firepower, Masters of Business Excellence. Why, I was assembling an A-Team, thought leaders who had already demonstrated their masterful abilities.

I just knew his expert contribution on Leadership would be important, but was amazed how, through his generous servant heart of a great leader, he poured massive amounts extra value into this project. 
He wrote a Masterclass on Exemplary Leadership, Hands down. 
I know why.  

We share a vision to impact lives.  

As a Leadership Author and Facilitator myself based on my nearly 2 decades as a CEO, I had met someone that I could truly learn from to this day. 
I discovered as an entrepreneur that one of the best investments I ever made was in the development of the people around me.
Without blinking an eye, I can enthusiastically suggest his keen acumen and wealth of knowledge to empower and align the leadership of any organization. I very much look forward to our future projects to impact lives together.

headline: Interior Designer, Project Manager, and Curator | Designing Residential, Hospitality, and Retail Spaces | Crafting Conscious Environments Through Materiality and Atmosphere
about:
I am the founder and interior designer of xomos studio.  I believe that design is a romantic language of its own kind.  A language that creates a dialogue by shaping interiors through atmospheres that elevate the way people live and experience space. 

As a designer, my mission is to curate environments that go beyond aesthetics, where materiality, art, and atmosphere merge to evoke emotion and memory. Each project is an act of artistic transformation approached with the same sensitivity and intention as an artist before their canvas.

My studies abroad and traveling to different countries shape my inspirations and how I envision xomos studio as a design and lifestyle atelier that celebrates collaboration by uniting artisans, trades, and clients through shared respect and creative intent. Together, we craft timeless spaces that inspire and endure.

I aspire to contribute to a larger collective that redefines how conscious design influences the way we live. Reimagining ideas and guiding them to fruition across diverse project types is where my creativity flourishes. Through intentional communication and the refinement of detail, I aim to shape experiences that feel both personal and elevated.

Design, to me, is not just what you see, it’s what you feel.

experiences.title: Interior Designer + Project Manager
experiences.jobDescription:
xomos studio is a design studio focused on creating refined spatial experiences with interior and architectural integrity that impact lifestyle. I lead the studio with an emphasis on collaboration where partnering with architects, consultants, and craftspeople who share a commitment to thoughtful design and cultural context.  As both Interior Designer and Project Manager, I oversee projects from concept to completion, translating vision into cohesive interiors.  Each project is guided by intention, where craftsmanship, material sustainability, and atmosphere converge to create spaces that resonate with purpose and presence.

Website: www.xomosstudio.com

experiences.title: Independent Interior Designer
experiences.jobDescription:
As an independent designer, I collaborated directly with private clients, interior and architecture studios, and developers on residential, commercial, and boutique hospitality projects across Texas and abroad. My focus was on delivering personalized and functional spaces that integrated design concept, documentation, and project coordination with each client’s specific goals and budget.

Key Contributions:
• Collaborated with multiple design studio owners to support client projects through technical drawings, 3D modeling, renderings, and sourcing of materials and furnishings.
• Created interior layouts, finishes, and lighting designs for investor-led single-family and multi-family developments in Dallas, directing both interior and exterior specifications.
• Assisted architects on high-end residential projects in Turks and Caicos with furniture layouts and selection guidance.
• Gained diverse, independent project experience across residential, commercial, and development sectors, including craftsmanship work in furniture restoration and reupholstery.

experiences.title: Interior Designer
experiences.jobDescription:
Allspace Solutions is a design-build firm specializing in signage, workplace, hospitalty, and retail environments. As part of their interior design team, I led the creative development of cannabis dispensary projects for the states of New Jersey and New York, managing from initial concept to installation. My work involved optimizing workflows, leading design initiatives, and coordinating across departments to ensure design integrity and timely delivery.

Key Contributions:
• Managed the design and implementation of prefabricated dispensary fixtures and a comprehensive product catalog, reducing lead times and improving the client experience.
• Designed and delivered 9 of 24 commercial dispensary and lounge projects in New Jersey within the first year, overseeing each from concept to completion.
• Influenced initiation of cross-functional design meetings that strengthened communication between design, sales, and production teams for more efficient project execution.
experiences.jobLocation: West Deptford, New Jersey, United States

experiences.title: Junior Interior Designer / Design Project Coordinator
experiences.jobDescription:
Area-17 is a Florence-based international design studio known for its contemporary architectural and interior design work across Europe and the Middle East. As part of the hospitality team, I contributed to branded developments and concept studies for EMAAR in Dubai, assisting senior designers with concept research, design documentation, and coordination to ensure the highest level of design integrity and delivery.

Key Contributions:
• Supported the design team in developing concept narratives, material studies, and client presentations for large-scale hospitality and commercial projects.
• Produced comprehensive design presentations to communicate design intent and construction specifications for EMAAR’s production team, leading the design intent of sales exhibit stands for their luxury hotels.
• Coordinated with consultants and project managers to deliver tender-phase packages that met project standards and timelines.

recommendations.subtitle: Helikon LLC | Business Operations, Technology Solutions
recommendations.context: Nick managed Jesse directly
recommendations.description:
As the CEO of Tokenizer, it gives me immense pleasure to endorse Jesse Hambly, a truly exceptional team member during his tenure with us. Jesse's contributions to our company went far beyond his official role; his innovative thinking and strategic approach played a pivotal part in several of our key projects.

Jesse's unique blend of technical expertise and creative problem-solving skills made him an invaluable asset to the Tokenizer team. He possesses a rare combination of deep industry knowledge and a natural flair for marketing strategy, which allowed him to successfully lead and execute complex projects with efficiency and finesse.

What sets Jesse apart is his exceptional ability to connect with both team members and clients. His communication skills are outstanding, and his positive attitude creates an atmosphere of enthusiasm and collaboration. Jesse's commitment to excellence, coupled with his ability to mentor and inspire those around him, has left a lasting impact on our organization.

I have no doubt that Jesse's future endeavors will be marked with the same level of success and innovation that he brought to Tokenizer. He is not just a great team player but also a visionary leader, and any organization would be fortunate to have him on board.

headline: Backend Talent Partner for Talent Placement Firms | Director to C-Suite in Days, Not Months | 126K+ Profiles Evaluated | Pre-Vetted Leadership Bench | Ex-Fortune 500 Headhunter | Founder, ExecBrand
about:
I help agencies find VP to C-suite talent for client projects.

Interim CFOs.
Fractional CMOs.
VP Operations.
Project-based executives.


THE PROBLEM:

Your client needs an interim CFO for a turnaround.

You need a fractional CMO for an enterprise client.

A portfolio company needs a VP of Operations.

You can't find them.

They're not on job boards.

They're employed.

But open to the right project.


THAT'S WHERE I COME IN:

I've evaluated 126,000+ profiles.

I source executive talent every day.

I know where VP-to-C-suite professionals are.

I know what makes them consider interim work.

I know how to position agency projects, so they say yes.


Whom I WORK WITH:

Management consulting firms.
Private equity firms.
Fractional executive companies.
Digital transformation agencies.
Strategic advisory firms.


RECENT PLACEMENTS:

Interim CFO for PE-backed manufacturing company.
6-month turnaround. $50M revenue. Burning cash.

Fractional CMO for B2B SaaS.
Scaling $10M to $50M ARR.

VP Operations for a consulting firm client.
9-month restructuring engagement.

Chief Strategy Officer for digital transformation.
$100M+ company. Agency project.

Interim COO for portfolio company.
Kept operations running during permanent search.

(Client names confidential due to NDAs. Full case studies available on request.)


WHY EXECUTIVES TAKE INTERIM WORK:

Most agencies think all executives want permanent roles.

Not true.

Thousands of experienced CFOs, CMOs, and COOs prefer:

6-12 month projects over permanent roles.
Fractional work (2-3 companies at once).
Interim placements between jobs.
Portfolio company turnarounds.
Transformation projects with clear end dates.

You just need to know where to find them.


HOW IT WORKS:

You need VP or C-suite talent for a client project.

You tell me the role, timeline, and situation.

I source candidates in 1-2 weeks.

You interview.

You decide.


WHAT I DO DIFFERENTLY:

I don't just post jobs and wait.

I actively source executives who aren't looking.

I know what makes them leave a permanent role for project work.

I've been doing this for years.


MOST AGENCIES I WORK WITH:

Need interim executives for client projects.
Build fractional C-suite offerings.
Staff portfolio companies.
Lost deals because they couldn't find talent fast enough.


THE COMMON THREAD:

They all needed VP-to-C-suite talent.

They couldn't find them.

I found them in 1-2 weeks.


If you're an agency that needs VP-to-C-suite talent for client projects, DM me.


Email: biaggio@execbrand.co

experiences.title: Career Transition Consultant
experiences.jobDescription:
👩‍💻🧑‍💻 Match4Talent Agency and Head of Table Advisory were built around one simple truth: most B2B companies don’t struggle with finding resumes—they struggle with sparking conversations that lead to the right hires and lasting partnerships.

❌ HR leaders are overwhelmed with noise.
❌ Key decision-makers are hard to reach.
❌ Top talent is busy — and not responding.

We asked the tough questions: Why are hiring conversations breaking down? Why do strong candidates ghost? Why do brands with great offers fail to attract the right leaders?

The answer wasn’t “more job postings.” It was strategy + storytelling.

That’s why we bridge the gap between HR professionals and key stakeholders by combining executive recruitment strategy with high-impact brand storytelling.

⚡ We design recruitment campaigns that cut through the silence.
⚡ We craft copy and messaging that makes decision-makers stop scrolling.
⚡ We help B2B companies build pipelines that not only attract top talent but keep them engaged.

Instead of transactional recruiting, we create systems that inspire trust, strengthen relationships, and scale with clarity.

At Match4Talent and Head of Table Consulting, we don’t just fill roles—we solve the deeper problem: aligning leaders, talent, and stories in a way that drives sustainable growth.

experiences.title: Global Talent Partner
experiences.jobDescription:
In talent acquisition, the biggest challenge was never just “filling roles.” It was answering tougher questions: Why aren’t we attracting the right talent? Why are leaders waiting too long for critical hires? Why are sourcing teams missing opportunities to connect with top candidates before competitors do?

❌ Sourcing strategies were outdated.
❌ Pipelines were thin and reactive.
❌ Candidate engagement was dropping — especially in hard-to-fill roles.

I leaned into curiosity and began to reimagine sourcing as a proactive, data-driven, and people-first function.

⚡ I built sourcing frameworks that went beyond job boards, tapping into hidden talent pools across Canada and international markets. These strategies consistently delivered top performers for complex, high-demand roles.
⚡ I partnered directly with executives and hiring managers to understand business priorities, shaping sourcing campaigns that matched not only skills but cultural fit.
⚡ I led and mentored sourcing teams, training them to move from transactional outreach to relationship-driven engagement that built trust with candidates from the first touchpoint.
⚡ I drove the use of market intelligence and talent mapping, transforming sourcing from guesswork into a strategic advantage — giving leadership real-time insights into talent availability, competition, and demand.
⚡ I optimized our CRM and sourcing technologies, implementing best practices that streamlined workflows and improved candidate experience.

This role reinforced my belief that sourcing isn’t about chasing candidates — it’s about building ecosystems of talent, aligning sourcing with business strategy, and creating meaningful conversations that turn passive talent into future leaders.

As Sourcing Director, my focus was simple: anticipate hiring needs before they became pain points, empower teams with the right tools and strategies, and ensure that organizations never had to choose between speed, quality, and culture fit.

experiences.title: Strategic Sourcing Specialist
experiences.jobDescription:
•	❌ Filled mission-critical roles? → I collaborated with Fortune 500 clients to uncover hidden talent pools and secure top performers for their hardest-to-fill positions.
	•	⚡ Hiring chaos slowing decisions? → I refined job descriptions, removed bottlenecks, and mentored recruiting teams so hiring managers could move faster with confidence.
	•	🤔 Flying blind in the market? → I delivered deep-dive research and talent insights that turned guesswork into strategy — helping clients source smarter, not harder.

experiences.title: Talent Acquisition Specialist
experiences.jobDescription:
•	Noticed high turnover in call center roles and developed recruitment strategies tailored to the telecommunications industry — improving client satisfaction across Canadian regions.
	•	Saw disconnects between hiring managers and recruiters, and built trust through hands-on training and rapport, creating alignment that sped up decision-making and reduced friction.
	•	Identified workforce disengagement risks and introduced retention programs, promotion pathways, and focus groups to keep top talent engaged and committed.
	•	Recognized inconsistencies in performance standards and led the design and upkeep of a system with clear job descriptions, fair evaluation tools, and measurable expectations.
	•	Observed gaps in inclusivity and championed diversity initiatives, creating equal opportunities and aligning with the company’s broader strategic goals.
	•	Questioned inefficiencies in the hiring cycle and streamlined full-cycle recruitment — from sourcing and screening to onboarding — to create a smoother candidate and manager experience.

updates.postText:
Are You Trying Too Hard To Fit In? 🤔

In this big world, you’ll meet people who think, act, and believe in different things. 🌍

And guess what? That’s totally OKay, it’s what makes life interesting ! 🎉

But here’s the thing…
It’s NOT okay to force yourself to fit in where you don’t belong. 🚫

Trying to be someone you’re not can hurt you and others too.

So if you feel like it’s time to move on, that’s totally fine! ✨
Find a place where you feel good, safe, and happy.
And don’t stress about what others might say.

Want Help Figuring Out Where You Really Belong?

Join our FREE Workshop where we’ll talk about how to:

➡️Spot what’s burning you out 🔥
➡️	Find more balance and peace ⚖️
➡️Get back to what makes you feel    alive ❤️
➡️Stay calm and focused, even when    life feels hard 🌿

SEND me a message and I will follow up with you regarding the next steps.

TAKE the first step toward a happier, healthier you!

#FindYourPlace #Belonging #BurnoutHelp #LiveYourTruth #YouMatter #Motivation

Wow, that looks SUPER MAJESTIC, doesn't it?!👁👀 😱🤩 


Who can imagine something so extraordinary while a drone is filming a special moment? 


Do you think of situations and metaphors from your life? 


I realize that not only marine biologists should take note of this.


Is there anything you can do or say if you find something scary? 


You can say, "I'll do it anyway. No pun intended, if that describes you then you should take the plunge. 


It's okay to take risks, obviously a lot easier said than done, 


but practicing breathing and mindfulness would be a good place to start.


In the end, you'll be proud of how far you've come, even if it seems like a tidal wave is about to hit.



#marinebiology #fearless #gettingthingsdone #mindfulness #knowledge #specialcreatures #fightorflight #personaldevelopment

Can you say that she's aging well and still has this amazing talent that lifts others' spirits up? 

Bravo! 🙌🤩👏 She also appeared on the AGT show. 

She has been dancing since she was a young girl and she has loved it ever since. 

It brings her joy and happiness, and she can't imagine her life without it.

For most of us, the answer is probably not many. 

Each day, we do what we have to do without feeling excited. But what if we could change that? 

What if we could find ways to be passionate about our work and lifestyle? 

God has blessed her with great talent, and she is a true warrior woman.

#talent #passion #creativity #liveinthemoment #happiness #peoplemakethedifference #socialnetworking

The #dopamine levels will click in your brain when you see this for sure! 🧠

Wow, this is a great opportunity to work together as a team! 

Any marine biologist on-site?

Let's make this a teamwork game moment!

Who wants to play ball with this stunning beluga whale?

Remarkable moments are rare, so make sure to savour them when they do happen!

Is this once-in-a-lifetime moment worth savouring? 

When you see a beautiful sunset or have a funny moment at work or with a loved one when you're happy.

They make life worth living with meaning! 

Acknowledge how far you've come, how blessed you are, and how much happiness you have in your life.

#opportunity #teamwork #team #happiness #dopamine #joyful #liveinthemoment #peoplemakethedifference #seacreatures #marinebiologist

No need to be a perfectionist. 


Your don’t need to have the perfect execution on what to do next.


You dont have to have the big fancy title or rankings.

Those are just guidelines for career paths.


It’s about finding a problem and meeting the needs and paint points in the moment.


No disqualifications here just spread sincere kindness and compassion.


When was the last time you performed an act of kindness? 


Do you question your own motives let alone others who do these random acts?


I really believe that many people don’t know these acts of compassion actually happen.



It's amazing how something so small can have such a remarkable impact.


Have you witnessed this firsthand,


and were reminded of the power that kindness holds and how it bonds humans together.


It’s there to make the world of better place.


Acts of kindness are like seeds that we plant in the world, 


waiting for the sunshine to grow into something beautiful. 


From making that unexpected call or  someone offering a listening ear, these small gestures can make a significant impact. 


Let's all strive to spread kindness wherever we go, sharing this sentiment with those around us. 


Together, we can create a ripple effect that positively impacts the lives of others. 


One person and act at a time. 


#gestures #kindness #compassion #linkedin #community #love #empathy

educations.title: SAJE- Empowering Entrepreneurs -http://www.sajeenaffaires.org/en/
educations.subtitle: Starting a Business (5264)(Professional Specialzation Attestation) Certification Date License 763403, development of entrepreneurial skills entrepreneurial integration of newcomers financial forecasts
educations.description:
As a leader in its field, the SAJE has adopted the mission to contribute to the business success of new entrepreneurs by offering consulting services, coaching and training.

In 1985, a number of youth initiative support groups were established. The directors of these assistance services for young entrepreneurs (the ancestors of the SAJE) had no idea of the true import of what they had done or the real scope of the adventure they were embarking on. The course ahead of them was not all smooth sailing.

In two decades, the SAJE model went through many transformations and overcame many obstacles, all while continuing to provide the same excellent service to aspiring entrepreneurs in Québec. In general, it was highly successful, both in terms of politics and economics and in terms of the perception of entrepreneurship.

recommendationsReceived.context: Scott worked with Biaggio but they were at different companies
recommendationsReceived.description:
Biaggio is a talented people leader, right down to his core values, talents, skills, & motivations. 

I’d been connected with him as an industry leader for a few years before I ever got the chance to assess him professionally.  When I did, I had a much greater understanding of what made him tick.  
He’s passionate motivated in his values for Leadership, Individualism (Authenticity), & Economic, ROI Oriented in action.  He’s less interested in balance or harmony in life, with the bottom line/results  being most important.
 
His strengths include: 
• Handling objections, questions, & pressure with poise & confidence.
• Very much at ease in making presentations to large or small groups.
• Scores like those known to be 'movers & shakers' in the workplace.
• Potential to be an engaging presenter.
• A self-starter & active agent in all he does.
• Understands people very well, & uses that understanding to lead, persuade, & motivate.
• Able to delegate responsibility to others in an enthusiastic & personable way.
• An excellent team-player, very effective at training or developing others.

In his work, his ideal Job Climate & activities include:
• Building a network of people & contacts with groups.
• Activities to get & maintain the attention of others.
• A non-hostile working environment.
• A democratic supervisor & work environment.
• Activities with many opportunities for interaction with people.
• Freedom from routine work.
• Public recognition for accomplishments.
• Variety in the work tasks & multiple projects.

Based on his style preferences, count on him to be adventuresome in trying new ideas and innovations.  He’s open to new approaches and takes an inquisitive and open attitude toward change.  He is very enthusiastic in working with others, & gregarious & outgoing with most everyone you meet.  No one is a stranger to him!  

He’s also able to develop a variety of strategies and procedures as situations demand.  Like a Master Chef, he’s always cooking, with varied activities, never a dull moment.   He possesses a high interest level in working with others, & makes friends easily with his personal & friendly approach.  

It was a great pleasure to work with him, & learn all of this & more!  I highly recommend him for any great leadership opportunity that aligns with his passions & values, as he will be successful for the long haul, if he’s allowed to do what he does best.

Please contact me with any questions about Biaggio, I’d be happy to back up everything I’ve documented about him using validated tools, & our time together.

Sincerely,
Scott Hulderson

headline: Marketing, GTM and Growth Leader | LinkedIn Top Voice
about:
I am privileged to lead our efforts in navigating the complexities of today's financial landscape with a marketing strategy that is as innovative as it is inclusive. At Wells Fargo, we are committed to creating a workplace and a customer experience that thrives on talent, learning, and diversity. In an era where technology and finance are increasingly intertwined, I believe in the transformative power of marketing to not only connect with our diverse customer base but also to drive forward our mission of helping customers succeed financially.

With a rich background in marketing and strategic planning, accumulated through years of experience in the financial services sector, my journey has been marked by a dedication to leveraging marketing as a tool for sustainable business growth and social impact. My expertise lies in understanding customer needs, market trends, and technological advancements, enabling us to craft marketing strategies that are not only effective but also ethically grounded and socially responsible.

My role involves a deep collaboration with cross-functional teams to innovate and execute marketing campaigns that resonate with our diverse clientele, enhance brand loyalty, and drive customer engagement. This includes harnessing data analytics to inform decision-making, personalizing customer interactions to enhance satisfaction, and deploying omnichannel marketing strategies to reach customers wherever they are.

Skills:

Strategic Marketing & Branding
Go to market strategy
Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
Data-Driven Marketing & Analytics
Digital Marketing & Social Media Strategy
Market Research & Competitive Analysis
Diversity & Inclusion in Marketing
Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Initiatives

At Wells Fargo, we are dedicated to not just being a leader in financial services, but also an organization that makes a positive impact on the communities we serve. By prioritizing diversity, equity, and inclusion in our marketing efforts, we aim to not only reflect the varied tapestry of our customer base but also to foster a culture of belonging and innovation.

I am excited about the future of marketing at Wells Fargo and am always open to connecting with like-minded professionals who are passionate about using marketing to drive both business success and meaningful societal change. Let's explore how we can collaborate to build not only dynamic and inclusive marketing strategies but also create lasting impacts on our global community.

experiences.title: VP of Marketing
experiences.jobDescription:
✨ Spearheading the development and execution of go-to-market strategies as the Vice President of Marketing at Wells Fargo, ensuring alignment with business objectives and market dynamics.

✨ Playing a pivotal role in expanding Wells Fargo's customer base and market presence through innovative marketing campaigns and targeted outreach efforts, driving successful launches of new banking products and services.

✨ Leading the design and implementation of marketing strategies that garner external recognition for Wells Fargo as a leading financial institution, effectively positioning the bank's offerings in the competitive market landscape.

✨ Developing comprehensive go-to-market plans and executing multi-channel campaigns to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement across diverse demographics, driving adoption and usage of banking solutions.

✨ Advocating for the adoption of cutting-edge marketing technologies and analytics tools to optimize campaign performance and drive measurable results, enabling data-driven decision-making in go-to-market strategies.

✨ Providing essential support for leadership development initiatives within the marketing department, including mentorship programs and skills development workshops, to cultivate a high-performing and collaborative team culture focused on effective go-to-market execution.

experiences.title: Marketing Director
experiences.jobDescription:
✨ Spearheaded strategic marketing initiatives to establish and promote brand awareness, thought leadership, and community engagement at Google DeepMind.
✨ Played a vital role in expanding global outreach and engagement, significantly increasing brand visibility across key markets.
✨ Led the design and execution of data-driven marketing campaigns, resulting in external recognition for Google DeepMind as a leader in AI innovation and ethical technology practices.
✨ Developed targeted content strategies and executed high-impact digital campaigns, fostering a strong brand presence within the AI and technology community.
✨ Advocated for cross-functional collaboration, integrating marketing insights into product development to ensure alignment between innovation and audience engagement.
✨ Provided crucial support for leadership branding initiatives, including thought leadership positioning and strategic communications, aimed at strengthening DeepMind’s influence within the AI research and enterprise landscape.

experiences.title: Assistant Vice President Marketing
experiences.jobDescription:
✨ Played a pivotal role in facilitating the successful execution of a global program covering employees worldwide.
✨ Headed a cross-functional team responsible for overseeing critical HR Business Partner deliverables, including Talent Reviews, Succession Planning, Inclusion & Diversity, Leadership Development, Recognition, Employee Engagement, and Retention.
✨ Provided valuable support to a vast global workforce comprising millions of employees.
✨ Designed and implemented an extensive, high-touch onboarding experience in India during a period of rapid growth and challenging conditions.
✨ Championed the development of an internal career marketplace, a program recognized with a Brandon Hall Award, benefiting employees across 55+ countries.
✨ Led change management initiatives with a strong emphasis on data and analytics.
✨ Conducted comprehensive data analysis to assess the performance of new hires and identify attrition trends.
✨ Achieved significant reductions in recruitment, attrition, and productivity costs through program implementation.

experiences.title: Learning Executive
experiences.jobDescription:
✨ Created a streamlined process document for the Continuous Education Program, ensuring alignment with the workforce development initiative.
✨ Collaborated with the Insurance and Technology Vertical to collect essential training and developmental requirements, subsequently partnering with the solution delivery team to tailor enablement solutions to meet specific business needs.
✨ Assumed responsibility for delivering training encompassing Technical, Process, and Quality-related content.
✨ Conducted thorough analysis of Level 1 Feedback from training sessions, adeptly applying RCA (Root Cause Analysis) techniques to pinpoint areas for enhancement and actively collaborating with stakeholders to implement necessary improvements.

headline: Helping overwhelmed entrepreneurs build businesses that run with clarity, freedom, and peace, even without their daily involvement.
addressWithCountry: Columbus, Ohio Metropolitan Area, United States
about:
Kristy Yoder is a Filipina-American entrepreneur based in Ohio and the Founder & CEO of Smart VAs and Meet 5-Star Pros. She is the host of The Lazy Entrepreneur Podcast, where she helps entrepreneurs and leaders scale their businesses through smart delegation, systems, and sustainable leadership.

Kristy began her journey as a freelance virtual assistant and digital marketer before building and scaling multiple businesses. Today, she is a 7-figure business owner who leads a global team of 70+ professionals and has helped over 400 U.S. businesses scale since 2019.

Through hard work, efficient delegation, and intentional systems, she has designed a business that supports a freedom-filled life.

Kristy is deeply passionate about helping stressed and overwhelmed business owners reclaim their time, freedom, and peace while growing profitable, aligned businesses. During her personal time, she enjoys skiing, traveling, and creating videos for her dog, Maestro.

updates.postText:
Are You a Lazy Entrepreneur? 🤔

Not because you don’t like working—but because you know there’s a smarter way to do it!

A Lazy Entrepreneur values efficiency, automates, delegates, and systemizes so their business grows without them doing everything.

Over the next few weeks, I’ll share my best tips on scaling without hustling 24/7—including how to become a Master Delegator!

👉 Follow me & stay tuned! Comment “LAZY” to grab my FREE Lazy Entrepreneur Starter Kit

#worksmarternotharder #entrepreneurship #businessowners #womensupportingwomen #risktakers

Say goodbye to overwhelm👇

A few years ago, I was drowning in work—emails, social media, client tasks… you name it. I was exhausted and had ZERO time for myself.

Then I realized: I didn’t start my business to work 24/7. I wanted freedom. But I was stuck micromanaging everything.

That’s when I implemented A.D.S. → Automate, Delegate, Systemize. And it changed EVERYTHING.

✅ Automation – Tools handle emails, scheduling & payments.
✅ Delegation – My VAs manage admin, content & support.
✅ Systemization – SOPs keep my business running without me.

Now? My business thrives—even when I take time off!

Ready to stop doing it all yourself?

It’s time to hire a virtual assistant! My team can help so you can finally focus on what matters most. Check the link in bio to schedule a call!

Want to work smarter, not harder? Comment “LAZY” to get my FREE Lazy Entrepreneur Starter Kit!

#AutomateDelegateSystemize #WorkSmarterNotHarder #VirtualAssistants #BusinessGrowth #EntrepreneurLife

Busy but getting nowhere?

You’re stuck in time-wasting tasks that are holding you back! Smart entrepreneurs automate, delegate, and systemize—so why aren’t you?

Top 3 Time-Wasters:

Manual Work – Automate invoices, scheduling, & follow-ups.

Doing Everything Yourself – Hire a VA for admin & marketing.

Repeating Work – Use templates, SOPs & workflows.

Want to work smarter, not harder? Comment “LAZY” to get my FREE Lazy Entrepreneur Starter Kit!

#businessgrowth #entrepreneurship #lazyentrepreneur #masterdelegator #entrepreneurlife #digitalmarketing #socialmediamarketing

Delegate tasks to a virtual assistant and reclaim your time for what truly matters. 💼👩‍💻 

Whether it's handling emails, scheduling appointments, or managing social media, let a virtual assistant be your secret weapon against delays. 🌐💡

Ready to make the leap? 

Comment or DM "Ready" to book a call and explore the game-changing benefits of having a virtual assistant on your team. 📞🗓️ 

Or, if you're curious about mastering the art of effective delegation, drop a "Delegate" in the comments or DM to learn valuable tips and tricks. 

Let's elevate your business together! 🤝

headline: Federal Acquisition Specialist | 17+ Years Supporting TS/SCI Programs and Business Development | $8B+ Lifecycle Projects | Specialized in standardizing internal processes that drive follow-on awards.
about: I’m a Federal Acquisition Specialist with 17+ years supporting complex federal programs, including TS/SCI environments, and more than $8B in lifecycle efforts spanning acquisition planning, execution, and follow-on awards.Throughout my career, I’ve worked across the full contract lifecycle — from early acquisition strategy through delivery execution — and have seen firsthand why some teams consistently earn strong CPARS ratings while others struggle to replicate success. The difference is rarely talent or effort. It’s how internal processes are structured, standardized, and reinforced as programs scale.My expertise centers on translating acquisition requirements into clear, repeatable internal processes so expectations are understood, execution is consistent, and performance is easy for the Government to evaluate and document. When this is done well, strong CPARS outcomes become the norm — and follow-on awards are a natural extension of performance, not a scramble.I’m not pursuing individual contributor roles. When organizations reach out, it’s typically because they want senior-level acquisition judgment embedded into how their teams operate, rather than tied to a single person.Cradle2Contract is where I codify this experience into reusable capability for organizations. It provides standardized acquisition and business development tools — including RFI and Sources Sought response generators, process frameworks, and execution guidance — designed to help teams consistently translate strong performance into competitive positioning for future awards.I highly encourage anyone or companies interested in my services to check out the associated company profile page for more information. It contains tons of free content and business development tools specifically created to help professionals and companies alike stand-out to their customers and lock in more awards.

experiences.title: Founder | Cradle2Contract
experiences.jobDescription:
Cradle2Contract helps socioeconomically disadvantaged small businesses engage government buyers early — before the RFP is released.

Many small GovCon firms miss RFIs and Sources Sought not because they lack capability, but because they lack time, structure, and staff to respond consistently. This results in limited visibility during the very phase agencies use to shape future solicitations.

Built on real-world federal acquisition experience, Cradle2Contract provides infrastructure that makes early market engagement simpler and more repeatable — without requiring capture teams, proposal writers, or NDA-restricted data.

Core focus areas:
• RFI & Sources Sought response acceleration
• Early-stage GovCon market engagement enablement
• SOPs, templates, and tools for small & disadvantaged businesses

What we do NOT do:
• Proposal writing
• Pricing or competitive strategy
• NDA-restricted or solicitation-specific work

Our mission is straightforward: Federal Acquisitions, Made Simple.

headline: Founder & Coach @ HamiltonGrowth | Helping coaches create consistent demand
jobTitle: Founder & Coach | Helping coaches create consistent demand
addressWithCountry: Blowing Rock, North Carolina, United States
about:
Most coaches rely on referrals because most marketing is transactional, misaligned, or simply not built for the kind of work they do.

But that reliance creates uncertainty.
Great months followed by quiet ones.
Impact limited by chance.

I help coaches create consistent demand without forcing them out of integrity.

After failing my own coaching business trying to apply generic marketing/sales playbooks, I rebuilt my approach.

Now I build simple, repeatable systems for coaches that translate integrity, clarity, and their lived experience into steady, human conversations with the right people.

No pressure.
No performance.
No pretending.

Just consistent demand for your work.

I'll happily create your growth engine for free. Schedule some time with me here:
https://calendly.com/jeremy-hamiltongrowth/growth-engine-design

headline: Master Certified Executive Leadership Coach | LinkedIn Top Voice | TEDx Speaker | LinkedIn Learning Author
about:
The Human Intelligence Advantage™ | Joshua Miller

➤ "AI is changing everything about how we work — but it can’t change why we work"

I’m Joshua Miller — a Master Certified Executive Coach, author, and global leadership strategist helping leaders strengthen the one thing machines can’t replicate: emotional intelligence, adaptability, and authenticity.

For over two decades, I’ve coached Fortune 500 executives, founders, and emerging leaders to thrive in the most disruptive decade of their careers. My work sits at the intersection of AI and EI, teaching leaders how to stay relevant, resilient, and real — when everything else is being rewritten by algorithms.

⸻

🔹 MY PHILOSOPHY:
AI doesn’t replace leaders — it reveals which ones were replaceable. The future belongs to those who lead with Human Intelligence (HI) — the ability to align IQ, EQ, and AQ to create impact that technology can’t. I help leaders and organizations unlock what I call The Human Intelligence Advantage™ — a set of frameworks, mindsets, and tools that future-proof leadership in the AI age.

🔹 WHAT I DO:
As the CEO and Founder of JOSHUA MILLER Executive Coaching, I help leaders elevate performance, deepen emotional intelligence, and lead transformation at scale. My work appears across LinkedIn Learning, TEDx, Forbes, and global stages where the conversation on leadership and AI is being redefined.

🔹 WHAT I BELIEVE: 
The leaders who thrive in this decade will use technology as a tool — not a crutch. Because no algorithm replaces awareness. If you’re a leader ready to upgrade your mindset, modernize your leadership, and build impact that outlasts any AI — let’s connect.


☎ Book Your Coaching Discovery Call Today ➤ https://lnkd.in/eKi5cCce



*Certified in SCARF, EQ 2.0, MBTI, DISC, 6Seconds EI Assessment, Enneagram, DDI, Korn Ferry, and StrengthsFinder frameworks to support data-driven leadership coaching.

experiences.title: Author Linkedin Learning - "Coaching Yourself and Your Team from Uncertainty to Action"
experiences.jobDescription:
How do you plan for the future when the present is riddled with uncertainty? In times of uncertainty, say a global pandemic that throws the landscape of work and life into a chaotic state—purposeful leadership skills will meet the challenge. In this course, executive coach Joshua Miller answers that question with clarity. Understanding the what and why of uncertainty and change gives valuable insight, setting the foundation for learning how. After this course, you'll be better prepared to meet uncertainty at the moment and successfully prepare for a rapidly changing future.

Will you be ready to lead?

Take the course and start today. 

Now available on LinkedIn Learning:
https://www.linkedin.com/learning/coaching-yourself-and-your-team-from-uncertainty-to-action/the-value-of-effective-leadership-in-uncertain-times?u=2125562

experiences.title: Author Linkedin Learning - "Using Questions To Foster Critical Thinking & Curiosity"
experiences.jobDescription:
The one trait many successful leaders share is their natural curiosity and desire to learn. We are all innately curious—so why is it that some people seem to discover more answers and lead a more empowering life than others? Put simply, they tend to think critically and ask the right questions. In this course, learn how to leverage the power of questions to move your team, leadership, and career to the next level. Join Joshua Miller as he spells out the benefits of getting curious and shares how to empower yourself through questions. Discover social media's role in asking questions, why certain types of questions can lead to dead ends, how to effectively answer questions that are directed at you, and more.

So much is missed by not raising your hand, your voice, or your platform. Upon completing this course, you'll have a better understanding of how to use questions to seize opportunities and open doors.

Using Questions to Coach and Lead
with: Joshua Miller

Now available on LinkedIn Learning:
https://www.linkedin.com/learning/using-questions-to-coach-and-lead

and on Lynda.com:
https://www.lynda.com/Business-Skills-tutorials/Using-Questions-Coach-Lead/685022-2.html

experiences.title: AMAZON BEST SELLING AUTHOR: "I CALL BULLSHIT: Live Your Life, Not Someone Else's"
experiences.jobDescription:
Joshua Miller wants you to be happy. Not just getting by, not just successful by society's standards, but can't-wait-to-wake-up-every-single-day happy. If you're shaking your head, convinced that this is impossible for you, Joshua calls bullshit. The life you want is attainable-you simply need to reconnect with the person you really are.

I Call Bullshit: Live Your Life, Not Someone Else's takes the wildly overcomplicated advice presented by the self-help industry, distills it down to its basics principles, and reveals how those principles can help you become your authentic self. With insights designed to shake you out of your complacency, Joshua will show you how to face your problems head-on and conquer them with strategies that work for you. Your life doesn't have to suck. Honest. 

WHAT OTHERS ARE SAYING:

Do you really want to change? If so, Joshua Miller’s book “I Call Bullshit” will challenge you to really do it this time. Straight to the heart of the matter, this is a book you don’t want to miss!

- Steve Weatherford, Super Bowl Champion, 10-year NFL veteran, Fittest Man in the NFL

#joshuamiller #executivecoaching #careeradvice #getahead #leadership #personaldevelopment #mentalhealth #mentalheathlawareness #mindset

What happens when leaders misunderstand how AI thinks—but still judge how their people use it?


That’s one of the biggest leadership risks heading into 2026.

AI doesn’t think like humans. It works through patterns, probabilities, and past data. When leaders don’t understand that, they don’t just misread the technology—they misread their people. Judgment gets mislabeled as resistance. Speed gets confused with competence.

The research is already signaling this tension.

A 2025 Scientific Reports study found that strong AI literacy combined with regular tool use improves problem-solving and computational thinking. But a peer-reviewed study in HFES - Human Factors and Ergonomics Society  shows the flip side: when leaders over-rely on AI advice, automation bias increases and independent judgment declines.

➤ That’s the gap leaders must close.

If you lead people, AI literacy is now part of your job description—not to become technical, but to lead with discernment.

I recommend the following:

🔹 Ask yourself: Could I explain, in plain language, how AI influences decisions and workloads on my team? If not, spend 30 minutes mapping where AI informs—or silently shapes—choices today.

🔹 In leadership development, practice pausing before acting on AI recommendations by asking, “What might this model be missing?”

🔹 In talent reviews, reward leaders who challenge AI outputs and strengthen team judgment—not just those who adopt tools fastest.

Leadership credibility used to rest on business acumen alone.
Now it includes understanding the tools shaping how work actually happens.

In the AI era, tools aren’t the differentiator.
Human Intelligence is.

Coaching can help; let's chat.









♻️ Repost it to your network and follow Joshua Miller for more tips on coaching, AI-era leadership, career + mindset. | #ai #executivecoaching #leadership

AI is really good at answering questions. But who's asking the right ones?




I'm at LinkedIn for Learning Studios filming something I wish had existed years ago: a course on how curiosity and critical thinking can become your competitive advantage in an AI-driven world.

I can't share the details yet as we’re still filming, but here's the truth ➤ "the future belongs to people who know what to ask, not just what to prompt"

Follow me—you'll want to see this when it launches. 🚀 Joshua Miller
